title: Edward Hopper Nighthawks Mug
description:
Mug developed from Edward Hopper’s Nighthawks, 1942, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

A masterpiece from our collection can be enjoyed every day along with breakfast or afternoon tea! A great gift for a fellow art lover.

  • Size: 11oz.
  • Dimensions: 3.26 x 3.75 in.
  • Material: Ceramic
  • Dishwasher (top rack) and microwave safe.
